1:
Yahweh reigns; let the nations tremble.\q He sits enthroned above the cherubim; the earth quakes.
\q
2:
Yahweh is great in Zion;\q he is exalted above all the nations.
\q
3:
Let them praise your great and awesome name;\q he is holy.


\q
5:
Praise Yahweh our God\q and worship at his footstool.
\q He is holy.


\q
6:
Moses and Aaron were among his priests,\q and Samuel was among those who prayed to him.
\q They prayed to Yahweh, and he answered them.
\q
7:
He spoke to them from the pillar of cloud.\q They kept his solemn commands
\q and the statutes that he gave them.


\q
8:
You answered them, Yahweh our God.\q A forgiving God you were to them,
\q but one who punished their sinful deeds.
\q
9:
Praise Yahweh our God,\q and worship at his holy hill,
\q for Yahweh our God is holy.
